Package com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.monitor

Contains the classes used for providing statics about the user context.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ProfileContainer
    An extension of WContainer that renders some statistics after its normal output.
    UicStats
    UicStats provides methods for analysing a UIContext.
    UicStats.Stat
    Stores statistics on a component in a UI context.
    UicStatsAsHtml
    A utility class which writes out UicStats statistics in HTML format.

Package com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.monitor Description

Contains the classes used for providing statics about the user context.
